text: - My name is James Etienne.
I'm a Sales Leader.
And what I do is I support my team
in what they're trying to do.
(upbeat music)
My journey to AWS was intentional.

We get to see customers
solve business problems
using our technology.

My career journey started 25
years ago in telecom space.
As you go through your career,

you look at companies
that are doing things
that you respect.

And one of the things
that I respected with AWS
is their customer obsession.

As soon as I got here,
it wasn't just talk.
But what I felt like is that individually,

I'd find people in those jobs
that were customer obsessed,

but as a whole, I didn't
necessarily see it.
I saw it with AWS.
If you're customer obsessed,
meaning when you show up to work every day

what you look for is ways
to help your customer,
this is the place to be.
